us.phonetic: /v. ˌɪntɚˈsɛpt; n. ˈɪntɚˌsɛpt/, (v. in′tər sept′; n. in′tər sept′)

example.eg: The football player intercepted the pass in midair.
example.egtrans: 那名球员在半空中拦截了传球。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 拦截, 截住, 中途阻止

example.eg: The enemy intercepted a message before it could reach its destination.
example.egtrans: 敌人在电报传至目的地之前截获了它。

us.phonetic: /v. ˌɪntɚˈsɛpt; n. ˈɪntɚˌsɛpt/, (v. in′tər sept′; n. in′tər sept′)

example.eg: The advisers analyzed the communication intercepts.
The students calculated the graph's intercepts.
